title: A Matter of confidence: movement for children and parents (TEFC)
creator_contributor_role: Centre for Educational Services, Bristol Polytechnic, production company
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Child development
Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Slow learning children
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Slow learning children
Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Child development
description: Uses Veronica Sherbourne's methods in a movement session for children and their parents. Shows how movement experiences presented in the form of play can develop confidence in young children. Demonstrates how relationships can develop between adult and child, and between child and child. Includes a sequence involving slow learning children. Devised and narrated by Veronica Sherbourne.
